channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [LUCENE-3394] TestIndexFileDeleter checkIndex fail
item.description:
found on 3.x

ant test-tag -Dtestcase=TestIndexFileDeleter -Dtestmethod=testDeleteLeftoverFiles -Dtests.seed=7631088157098800527:4270221915205524915
